job.title: Software Engineer II
job.description: In this role, you should have excellent problem-solving skills and thorough knowledge of Android Device Architecture. Communication and documentation are key to this role as you will be working directly with the architecture and management teams.<br><ul><li>Understanding of Android Device Architecture. Focused on Kernel, HAL, Debug</li><li>Read requirements predominantly related to Hardware peripherals, Integrate, provide HAL interface to Application</li><li>We expect at least 50-60% of tasks will be related to coding</li><li>Previous knowledge on any device development is a plus<br></li></ul><strong><u>Preferred Education<br></u></strong><ul><li>Bachelor's Degree required or equivalent experience</li><li>Minimum of 5+ years of experience<br></li></ul><strong><u>Key Skills And Competencies<br></u></strong><ul><li>Device Driver and Hardware Abstraction Layer development</li><li>Knowledge of Linux Kernel, Bootloaders</li><li>Hands on Experience in development using any one of the languages C,C++, JAVA</li><li>Excellent communication skills</li><li>Experience with Android Development</li><li>Demonstrated technical experience</li><li>Demonstrated experience working independently and collaboratively on projects</li><li>Demonstrated experience trouble shooting</li><li>Broad knowledge of applicable IT systems/applications</li><li>Experience developing new systems and tools</li><li>Experience in documenting and maintaining up to date systems procedures</li><li>Advanced analytical skills</li></ul>
